019package org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu;
020
021import com.google.gson.JsonObject;
022import io.kubernetes.client.custom.Quantity;
023import io.kubernetes.client.custom.Quantity.Format;
024import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.ApiException;
025import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.apis.ApiextensionsV1Api;
026import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1CustomResourceDefinitionVersion;
027import io.kubernetes.client.util.Config;
028import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.dynamic.DynamicKubernetesApi;
029import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.dynamic.DynamicKubernetesObject;
030import java.io.IOException;
031import java.math.BigDecimal;
032import java.nio.file.Files;
033import java.nio.file.Path;
034import java.time.Instant;
035import java.util.Map;
036import java.util.Optional;
037import java.util.Set;
038import java.util.logging.Level;
039import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.events.BalloonChangeEvent;
040import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.events.RunnerConfigurationUpdate;
041import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.events.RunnerStateChange;
042import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.events.RunnerStateChange.State;
043import static org.jdrupes.vmoperator.util.Constants.VM_OP_CRD_NAME;
044import static org.jdrupes.vmoperator.util.Constants.VM_OP_GROUP;
045import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.util.GsonPtr;
046import org.jgrapes.core.Channel;
047import org.jgrapes.core.Component;
048import org.jgrapes.core.annotation.Handler;
049import org.jgrapes.core.events.Start;
050import org.jgrapes.util.events.ConfigurationUpdate;
051import org.jgrapes.util.events.InitialConfiguration;
052
053/**
054 * Updates the CR status.
055 */
056public class StatusUpdater extends Component {
057
058    private static final Set<State> RUNNING_STATES
059        = Set.of(State.RUNNING, State.TERMINATING);
060
061    private String namespace;
062    private String vmName;
063    private DynamicKubernetesApi vmCrApi;
064    private long observedGeneration;
065
066    /**
067     * Instantiates a new status updater.
068     *
069     * @param componentChannel the component channel
070     */
071    public StatusUpdater(Channel componentChannel) {
072        super(componentChannel);
073    }
074
075    /**
076     * On configuration update.
077     *
078     * @param event the event
079     */
080    @Handler
081    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
082    public void onConfigurationUpdate(ConfigurationUpdate event) {
083        event.structured("/Runner").ifPresent(c -> {
084            if (event instanceof InitialConfiguration) {
085                namespace = (String) c.get("namespace");
086                updateNamespace();
087                vmName = Optional.ofNullable((Map<String, String>) c.get("vm"))
088                    .map(vm -> vm.get("name")).orElse(null);
089            }
090        });
091    }
092
093    private void updateNamespace() {
094        if (namespace == null) {
095            var path = Path
096                .of("/var/run/secrets/kubernetes.io/serviceaccount/namespace");
097            if (Files.isReadable(path)) {
098                try {
099                    namespace = Files.lines(path).findFirst().orElse(null);
100                } catch (IOException e) {
101                    logger.log(Level.WARNING, e,
102                        () -> "Cannot read namespace.");
103                }
104            }
105        }
106        if (namespace == null) {
107            logger.warning(() -> "Namespace is unknown, some functions"
108                + " won't be available.");
109        }
110    }
111
112    /**
113     * Handle the start event.
114     *
115     * @param event the event
116     */
117    @Handler
118    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.DataflowAnomalyAnalysis",
119        "PMD.AvoidInstantiatingObjectsInLoops" })
120    public void onStart(Start event) {
121        try {
122            var client = Config.defaultClient();
123            var extsApi = new ApiextensionsV1Api(client);
124            var crds = extsApi.listCustomResourceDefinition(null, null, null,
125                "metadata.name=" + VM_OP_CRD_NAME, null, null, null,
126                null, null, null);
127            if (crds.getItems().isEmpty()) {
128                logger.warning(() -> "CRD is unknown, status will not"
129                    + " be updated.");
130                return;
131            }
132            var crd = crds.getItems().get(0);
133            if (crd.getSpec().getVersions().stream()
134                .filter(v -> v.getSubresources() == null).findAny()
135                .isPresent()) {
136                logger.warning(() -> "You are using an old version of the CRD,"
137                    + " status will not be updated.");
138                return;
139            }
140            var crdPlural = crd.getSpec().getNames().getPlural();
141            var vmOpApiVersions = crd.getSpec().getVersions().stream()
142                .map(V1CustomResourceDefinitionVersion::getName).toList();
143            for (var apiVer : vmOpApiVersions) {
144                var api = new DynamicKubernetesApi(VM_OP_GROUP, apiVer,
145                    crdPlural, client);
146                var res = api.get(namespace, vmName);
147                if (res.isSuccess()) {
148                    vmCrApi = api;
149                    observedGeneration
150                        = res.getObject().getMetadata().getGeneration();
151                    break;
152                }
153            }
154            if (vmCrApi == null) {
155                logger.warning(() -> "VM's CR is unknown, status will not"
156                    + " be updated.");
157            }
158        } catch (IOException | ApiException e) {
159            logger.log(Level.WARNING, e, () -> "Cannot access kubernetes: "
160                + e.getMessage());
161        }
162    }
163
164    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AvoidDuplicateLiterals")
165    private JsonObject currentStatus(DynamicKubernetesObject vmCr) {
166        return vmCr.getRaw().getAsJsonObject("status").deepCopy();
167    }
168
169    /**
170     * On runner configuration update.
171     *
172     * @param event the event
173     * @throws ApiException 
174     */
175    @Handler
176    public void onRunnerConfigurationUpdate(RunnerConfigurationUpdate event)
177            throws ApiException {
178        if (vmCrApi == null) {
179            return;
180        }
181        // A change of the runner configuration is typically caused
182        // by a new version of the CR. So we observe the new CR.
183        var vmCr = vmCrApi.get(namespace, vmName).throwsApiException()
184            .getObject();
185        if (vmCr.getMetadata().getGeneration() == observedGeneration) {
186            return;
187        }
188        vmCrApi.updateStatus(vmCr, from -> {
189            JsonObject status = currentStatus(from);
190            status.getAsJsonArray("conditions").asList().stream()
191                .map(cond -> (JsonObject) cond)
192                .filter(
193                    cond -> "Running".equals(cond.get("type").getAsString()))
194                .forEach(cond -> cond.addProperty("observedGeneration",
195                    from.getMetadata().getGeneration()));
196            return status;
197        });
198    }
199
200    /**
201     * On runner state changed.
202     *
203     * @param event the event
204     * @throws ApiException the api exception
205     */
206    @Handler
207    public void onRunnerStateChanged(RunnerStateChange event)
208            throws ApiException {
209        if (vmCrApi == null) {
210            return;
211        }
212        var vmCr = vmCrApi.get(namespace, vmName)
213            .throwsApiException().getObject();
214        vmCrApi.updateStatus(vmCr, from -> {
215            JsonObject status = currentStatus(from);
216            status.getAsJsonArray("conditions").asList().stream()
217                .map(cond -> (JsonObject) cond)
218                .forEach(cond -> {
219                    if ("Running".equals(cond.get("type").getAsString())) {
220                        updateRunningCondition(event, from, cond);
221                    }
222                });
223            if (event.state() == State.STARTING) {
224                status.addProperty("ram", GsonPtr.to(from.getRaw())
225                    .getAsString("spec", "vm", "maximumRam").orElse("0"));
226            }
227            return status;
228        });
229    }
230
231    private void updateRunningCondition(RunnerStateChange event,
232            DynamicKubernetesObject from, JsonObject cond) {
233        boolean reportedRunning
234            = "True".equals(cond.get("status").getAsString());
235        if (RUNNING_STATES.contains(event.state())
236            && !reportedRunning) {
237            cond.addProperty("status", "True");
238            cond.addProperty("lastTransitionTime",
239                Instant.now().toString());
240        }
241        if (!RUNNING_STATES.contains(event.state())
242            && reportedRunning) {
243            cond.addProperty("status", "False");
244            cond.addProperty("lastTransitionTime",
245                Instant.now().toString());
246        }
247        cond.addProperty("reason", event.reason());
248        cond.addProperty("message", event.message());
249        cond.addProperty("observedGeneration",
250            from.getMetadata().getGeneration());
251    }
252
253    /**
254     * On ballon change.
255     *
256     * @param event the event
257     * @throws ApiException 
258     */
259    @Handler
260    public void onBallonChange(BalloonChangeEvent event) throws ApiException {
261        if (vmCrApi == null) {
262            return;
263        }
264        var vmCr
265            = vmCrApi.get(namespace, vmName).throwsApiException().getObject();
266        vmCrApi.updateStatus(vmCr, from -> {
267            JsonObject status = currentStatus(from);
268            status.addProperty("ram",
269                new Quantity(new BigDecimal(event.size()), Format.BINARY_SI)
270                    .toSuffixedString());
271            return status;
272        });
273    }
274}
